Gideon Berridge

Full Stack Developer

About

A London (UK) based junior full stack developer looking for a new challenge after working as a front end developer for the last year.

Passionate about React, JavaScript, Ruby and Python, I would love my next role to include one or more of these. I also have considerable experience of HTML, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap, Django, Adobe CC, MVC, Github, Heroku and Firbase.

Aside from coding I also love music and playing instruments, travel and tinkering with Raspberry Pi's and Arduinos.

Download CV

Projects and Tutorials

I have built sites using the MVC structure, Agile workflow, Sass, CSS animation, flexbox, CSS grid, AJAX, API calls, Parcel and web scraping. Some of these techniques are in use in this site. Others have been used in the projects and tutorials.

ZappaQuiz

React / SCSS

A quiz app made in React about the musician Frank Zappa. It uses state to keep track of the score and issues you a Zappa song title as a compliment or insult based on the result. Uses props, hooks and lifting the state.

Refuge

HTML / CSS / JavaScript

A working static website for a band. Features include viewing videos in full screen, streaming tunes and links to purchase tickets for shows.

This site

HTML / JavaScript / SCSS (BEM)

Uses various JS techniques such as sticky header, slider, smooth scrolling and section fade as well as CSS animation and is built using Parcel and Babel for JS integration with older bowsers.

Tutorials Page

React / JavaScript / SCSS

Link to tutorials page that showcases front end techniques from various courses I've completed.
